All :
I have developed a junit extension call Prerequisite, which is
designed to handle the problem that you only want to run some tests
when some prerequisites are satisfied(E.g. you want to run the test
only on the linux platform, etc.)

the test will be like this.

    @RunWith(PrerequisiteAwareClassRunner.class)
    public class TestCasesOnDifferentOS {

        @Test
        @Prerequisite(checker = OSChecker.class, arguments = OSChecker.MAC)
        public void shouldRunOnMac() throws Exception {

        }
    }


anyone who needs customized Checker can easily write their own by
implementing the Check interface.

It is finished and tested

not sure if anyone is interested or is it possible that I can
contribute it to junit?

for more information, please go to http://code.google.com/p/junit-ext/

any comment will be appreciated
-- 
Hu Kai
blog : http://iamhukai.blogspot.com/
